description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党成立初期的内部派系，成员大多为曾在中国延安参与革命的朝鲜人。
description.en: An internal faction of the early Workers' Party of Korea, whose members were mostly Koreans who had participated in the revolution in Yan'an, China.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1930年代的革命根据地，延安派成员曾在此活动。
description.en: The revolutionary base of the Chinese Communist Party in the 1930s, where members of the Yan'an faction were active.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，曾被中国共产党支持成为朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction, who was once supported by the Chinese Communist Party to become the supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，强烈支持金日成成为朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union who strongly supported Kim Il-sung to become the supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创立者和首任最高领导人，游击队派首领，在1950年代清洗了延安派。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, leader of the Guerrilla faction, who purged the Yan'an faction in the 1950s.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 以金日成为首的朝鲜劳动党派系。
description.en: A faction of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 1956年8月在朝鲜劳动党内部发生的一场政治斗争，导致延安派和苏联派成员遭到大规模清洗。
description.en: A political struggle within the Workers' Party of Korea in August 1956, which led to a large-scale purge of members of the Yan'an and Soviet factions.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。后逃亡中国，曾向中联部提出组织力量进入朝鲜斗争但被拒绝。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident. He later fled to China and proposed to the International Liaison Department to organize forces to enter North Korea for struggle, but was rejected.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中被打倒。
description.en: A member of the Korean Yan'an faction who was purged during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的官方意识形态，由金日成于1955年提出，用以打击延安派和苏联派。
description.en: The official state ideology of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, proposed by Kim Il-sung in 1955 to counter the Yan'an and Soviet factions.

description.zh-cn: 一种被主体思想所批判的外交和政治思想，意指侍奉和依赖大国。
description.en: A diplomatic and political ideology criticized by the Juche idea, referring to serving and relying on great powers.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党早期的派系之一，成员主要为苏籍朝鲜人。
description.en: One of the early factions of the Workers' Party of Korea, its members were mainly Soviet Koreans.

description.zh-cn: 中国文化大革命时期的群众组织。
description.en: Mass organizations during the Chinese Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党中央政治委员会委员，后被罢免。
description.en: Member of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, later dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党中央政治委员会候补委员，后被罢免。
description.en: Alternate member of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, later dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民族保卫相，在1968年11月劳动党中央全会被清洗。
description.en: Minister of National Defence of North Korea, purged at the Central Committee plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea in November 1968.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民族保卫副相，在1968年11月劳动党中央全会被清洗。
description.en: Vice Minister of National Defence of North Korea, purged at the Central Committee plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea in November 1968.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军总参谋长，在1968年11月劳动党中央全会被清洗。
description.en: Chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, purged at the Central Committee plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea in November 1968.

en: International Liaison Department of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中共中央对外联络部的简称。
description.en: Abbreviation for the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 延安派是朝鲜劳动党成立初期的内部派系。
description.en: The Yan'an faction was an internal faction of the early Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 延安派成员大多曾在1930年代在中国共产党的根据地延安参与革命。
description.en: Most members of the Yan'an faction participated in the revolution in the 1930s at Yan'an, the base of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 延安派因其成员曾在延安参与革命活动而得名，该地点对其形成有重要影响。
description.en: The Yan'an faction was named after its members' revolutionary activities in Yan'an, a location that significantly influenced its formation.

description.zh-cn: 延安派成员组建了朝鲜独立同盟。
description.en: Members of the Yan'an faction formed the Korean Independence Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 延安派成员组建了朝鲜新民党。
description.en: Members of the Yan'an faction formed the New People's Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党曾想支持延安派成员武亭成为朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party once intended to support Mu Chong, a member of the Yan'an faction, to become the supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林强烈支持金日成成为朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: Stalin strongly supported Kim Il-sung to become the supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜领导人人选问题上，苏共最终获胜，使得金日成得以掌权。
description.en: On the issue of North Korea's leadership, the CPSU ultimately prevailed, allowing Kim Il-sung to take power.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是游击队派的首领。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was the leader of the Guerrilla faction.

description.zh-cn: 在1950年代，金日成对延安派进行了清洗。
description.en: In the 1950s, Kim Il-sung purged the Yan'an faction.

description.zh-cn: 由金日成领导的游击队派在1950年代对延安派进行了清洗。
description.en: The Guerrilla faction, led by Kim Il-sung, purged the Yan'an faction in the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 在八月宗派事件中，几乎所有延安派成员都被打倒。
description.en: During the August Faction Incident, almost all members of the Yan'an faction were purged.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，金日成提出主体思想。
description.en: In 1955, Kim Il-sung proposed the Juche idea.

description.zh-cn: 金日成提出主体思想以反对事大主义。
description.en: Kim Il-sung proposed the Juche idea to oppose Sadaejuui (flunkeyism).

description.zh-cn: 金日成利用主体思想打击延安派干部。
description.en: Kim Il-sung used the Juche idea to attack cadres of the Yan'an faction.

description.zh-cn: 金日成利用主体思想打击苏联派干部。
description.en: Kim Il-sung used the Juche idea to attack cadres of the Soviet faction.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

position.zh-cn: 劳动党中央政治委员会委员
position.en: Member of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea

description.zh-cn: 被朝鲜方面罢免，因为被认为是“中国思想对劳动党影响的主要传播者”。
description.en: Dismissed by the North Korean authorities for being considered a 'main propagator of Chinese thought's influence on the Workers' Party'.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

position.zh-cn: 劳动党中央政治委员会候补委员
position.en: Alternate Member of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea

description.zh-cn: 被朝鲜方面罢免，因为被认为是“中国思想对劳动党影响的主要传播者”。
description.en: Dismissed by the North Korean authorities for being considered a 'main propagator of Chinese thought's influence on the Workers' Party'.

description.zh-cn: 在1968年11月劳动党中央全会上被清洗。
description.en: Purged at the Central Committee plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea in November 1968.

description.zh-cn: 在1968年11月劳动党中央全会上被清洗。
description.en: Purged at the Central Committee plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea in November 1968.

position.en: Chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army

description.zh-cn: 在1968年11月劳动党中央全会上被清洗。
description.en: Purged at the Central Committee plenum of the Workers' Party of Korea in November 1968.

description.zh-cn: 中联部拒绝了徐辉等人提出的“组织力量进入朝鲜进行斗争”的要求。
description.en: The International Liaison Department rejected the request by So Hwi and others to 'organize forces to enter North Korea for struggle'.
